items.name: init(srcRect: Rect, hRes: Fixed, vRes: Fixed, version: Int16, reserved1: Int16, reserved2: Int32)
var hRes: Fixed
items.desc: The best horizontal resolution for the picture. A value of 0x0048000 specifies a horizontal resolution of 72 dpi.

items.name: var srcRect: Rect
items.desc: The optimal bounding rectangle for the resolution indicated by the hRes and vRes fields. To display a picture at a resolution other than that specified in the hRes and vRes fields, your application should compute an appropriate destination rectangle by scaling the imageâ€™s width and height by the destination resolution divided by the source resolution.

items.name: var vRes: Fixed
items.desc: The best vertical resolution for the picture. A value of 0x0048000 specifies a vertical resolution of 72 dpi.
